How to Build a Good OnlyFans Feed – 6 Effective Steps

So many people create an OnlyFans account daily, sustaining a rising OnlyFans monthly growth rate record.

The subscribers cheat sheet – tips to gain more subscribers on OnlyFans

Estimated Reading Time: 3 min 39 sec

Famous celebrity Blac Chyna makes a staggering $20 Million monthly on OnlyFans by serving exclusive NSFW content. That’s a whole lot of money. However, considering she charges $19.99 per subscriber, that’ll roughly factor out to 12 million subscribers. That’s exactly how many subscribers you need to make that much money.

If you’re wondering about why we’re bringing up all these crazy numbers? Well, you’re here to gain more subscribers or know how to, at the very least! Subscribers translate to earnings on OnlyFans and having a ton of them will only spike up your earnings even more. Although most models or creators hire an OnlyFans Agency to help them build a large number of subscribers on OnlyFans, you can also hack the tips and build up your subscribers by following a few tips and integrating some strategies utilized by high-earning OnlyFans creators and models.

This article will lead you through the subscriber gain cheat sheet to help you gain more subscribers on OnlyFans.

Make an appointment now

Your profile Speaks Volume

It all begins with your profile. Unfortunately, many creators start out and immediately neglect this. You can’t convert a large number of potential subscribers if your profile looks crappy.

Think of the most exclusive content creators on OnlyFans and try to check out their profiles. You’ll notice how seductive and appealing they seem and how immediately you have the increased urge to see more. That’s the job of an OnlyFans Page tailored to convert.

Your profile speaks volumes and is the first piece of the jigsaw puzzle you will be working with. If you can pull this out, you’re already on your way to having many subscribers and earning more on OnlyFans.

To that end, here are some tips for creating or remodeling an already existing OnlyFans profile to one that impresses potential subscribers.

Use outstanding profile pictures and cover photos

What do you think people see when they first come across your page on OnlyFans? Yes, you guessed that right, your profile.

And unlike any other person, would you particularly subscribe to something that doesn’t excite or impress you? Perhaps not.

If you’re going to reel in a good number of subscribers on this platform, you’ll have to up your visual game. First, pick out your best-ever picture; we understand it will be difficult, especially if you have tons of great photos lying around. Consequently, If you create exclusive and lewd content, you can pick out your best work that showcases your best look and grabs attention. Most importantly, the visual quality should be top-notch and not some pixelated or grainy photo; you’re only going to end up not being taken seriously.

We can as well take that trouble out your way. How? OnlyFans agencies have been around right from the site’s inception. We know what works and what doesn’t. Additionally, most agencies work with top models and high-earning creators, so they know photos can help you go viral and will help you achieve your goals. Apply now to gain access

You need a creative bio

A unique profile is never complete without a good “bio.” This is where all the necessary and subscribers-converting info goes. 

A basic rule of thumb for crafting a great OnlyFans bio is to follow the 80/20 rule. By this, we mean making your personal description take the smaller 20 percent while what you intend to offer and how consistent you intend to be take the larger 80 percent. 

It may seem confusing, but here’s a breakdown. 

Suppose you’re into Adult content, for instance. First, you can leave a little something about yourself, followed by what sort of content you’re offering and how often that’s going to happen, if possible. 

Try to be specific while being simple. Additionally, you can incorporate emojis or leave a subtle joke. Just be creative. Overall, you can always switch things up if they seem not to be working.

Potential subscribers will be more interested in your content if they’re impressed with what you have on your bio, in addition to an attention-grabbing profile image.

Likes are important too

Likes are an essential part of an outstanding profile. They elevate your profile and make others who aren’t yet your subscribers think, “well if others dig your content then i may as well give it a try.”

You can have your most liked content pinned to the top of your page. OnlyFans also allows you to pin your best posts (more than one) at the top of your page; this way, people who view your profile can always see that your content is doing well and will be pushed to subscribe.

A good way to get likes is to post consistently and engage with your existing subscribers. Be consistent with your post engagement. Create 1 or two posts daily, and try to also engage them with PPV (pay per view) messages, live streams, Dms, and all. The more they get comfortable around you and see how amazing your content is, most importantly your person, the more they’ll leave you a like.

Get more page likes with the perfect profile-making tips. Apply now to recruit the services of an expert OnlyFans agency and become successful like other top models and creators.

Promotions are your kryptonite

To every content creator on OnlyFans trying to gain more subscribers, promotions are vital if you aim to gain a good number of subscribers. We understand that most creators or models start out with OnlyFans and already start getting the love and attention from fans. However, you’ve got to understand that not everyone is lucky. Still, promotions are very essential whether you’ve got enough engagements or not.

The one effective way to gain more subscribers on OnlyFans is to promote your OnlyFans Page. This cannot be stressed enough! Social media platforms like Twitter, Instagram, Reddit, Tiktok, and even Tinder are great places to start out.

Leverage every opportunity you have to promote your page every now and then. However, be cautious not to overdo it, or you may appear spammy and annoying. That may in turn snap back at you in an unpleasant way. 

To further add, go through the Terms and conditions of the platforms you wish to promote with, as most of these platforms may have strict rules about adult content. You just have to note the ones that are good with it and follow through with your promotions.

Make an appointment now

Always leave a bait

Getting people to subscribe to your content is easier if you leave hints of things that will reel them in. When you create promotional content, leaving a bait will make your potential subscribers itch to get in and see what new stuff you’re providing.

Remember, they can’t be forced to subscribe if they already know they’re going to end up seeing the regular stuff they see on a free subscription. So try as much to build up expectations that this time you’re offering something they’ve never seen from you before, something different, and something worth paying for. Give them a run for their money, and you’ll have tons of potential subscribers eating from your palm in a paid subscription.

Social media is your greatest tool

We know we’ve already spoken about promotions. Well, we’re getting into more detail with social media, and you should too!

Social media is your greatest tool for gaining more subscribers on OnlyFans. Aside from having a great profile and a ton of likes, leveraging the power of your social media is key to unlocking more subscribers.

If you already have a commendable number of followers on social media platforms like Instagram, Twitter, or Tiktok that aren’t subscribed to your content, then you’ve got some work to do.

Understandably, it’s going to be difficult to have each and every one of your followers become your paid subscriber on OnlyFans. But look at it this way, if you’ve got about a thousand followers on Twitter who dig your content and are constantly engaging your posts with likes and comments, then there’s every chance you can have at least 10 percent of that number subscribed to your page on OnlyFans.

You just have to ask them to subscribe to your OnlyFans if they want to see more, and you’d be surprised at the turnover.

Reddit forums are also good places to ask for subscribers. Gaining subscribers from Reddit is easy as the platform allows Adult content, so there’s no restriction on how exclusive and appealing you can tailor your promotions to reel in new subscribers. 

You can never truly leverage the power of social media if you’re not working with an OnlyFans agency. Fully tap from the power of social media and gain even more subscribers with expert tips from Fandafia. Apply now to get started.

Use hashtags

Hashtags are not only great on Instagram or Twitter but on Onlyfans as well. Fans often use them to find the content they’re interested in. Well, here’s your chance to find people interested in the type of content you offer.

Trying to make content gains a new level of difficulty if you have to serve them to the wrong audience. Obviously, you won’t get any subscribers. But by running a quick hashtag search, you can find things people are interested in around your niche. Most importantly, you will find people interested in what you offer. This way, getting them to subscribe to your content will be a walk in the park.

Engage with your followers

You often get a large number of followers and people who constantly engage and like your content with free subscription accounts. However, when you put out paid content, you find it hard to get anyone to subscribe to it. Does any of that ring a bell?

If this is the case, try connecting more with your followers. Chances are that if they can see you’ve got an amazing personality, they’ll take the risk and subscribe to your paid content. Occasionally appreciate your followers for engaging your posts, and they’ll be thrilled to return the favor by subscribing to your content.

Make an appointment now

Partner with other creators

While a few people may have their opinion about this, the truth remains that partnering with other creators on OnlyFans is rewarding. Remember, the goal is to gain more subscribers and earn more or at least have fun while at it.

Partnering with other OnlyFans creators is a great way to build your reputation and get some attention from people who subscribe to them as well.

Think of the number of subscribers they’ve got, and see how you can glean off this pool of subscribers. More so, you’re entirely new to them, so they’ll be tempted to check your page out. Additionally, there’s a higher probability they will subscribe to your content if they find it interesting and unique.

If you can reach out to other creators in your niche or a different niche, whatever the case is, then go ahead and reach out to them. I bet they’ll be interested if it’s going to be beneficial to them as well. Chances are that if they think your intentions are good, they might as well share their ideas or strategies with you.

You could go on live streams together or give shout-outs to each other. Better still, commenting on other creators’ posts and liking their content can expose you to their subscriber base as well. Soon you could get tons of subscribers subscribing to your content without batting an eyelid.

Offer promotional subscription prices

It sounds crazy trying to make a lot of money on OnlyFans but offering an insanely low subscription price. Well, this will be your key to reeling in new subscribers. 

Often fans on this platform get skeptical about the content they’re about to subscribe to, and we won’t blame them either because they’ll have to put up with it for a month straight if it’s trash. However, offering a promotional price on your content subscription will make your potential subscribers take the chance to test the waters; after all, it doesn’t cost much.

And it doesn’t have to be the worst money decision you make as you can set up your prices to go back to your preferred one once a certain number of people have subscribed or at a particular date. But most importantly, you’ll gain more subscribers.

Shout-outs aren’t desperate measures!

Another great way to gain more subscribers is to invest in shout-outs. Yes, you’ll have to put in some money for this purpose. Instagram influencers in your niche or other creators offering similar content can be approached for shout-outs. This will get you out there in front of the audience you need, and it won’t be long before you start noticing some serious growth in your subscriber base.

Note that if you’re just starting out, it is advisable to work with a micro-influencer. Someone who has 1000-15000 followers on Instagram. They’ll be more affordable.

Lastly, checking out their followers to see if they’re your relevant audience is recommended so you don’t get little or no response.

You can’t stress consistency

One piece of advice we give to models who just start out on OnlyFans is to stay consistent in what they do. It’s the life force to success for OnlyFans. This literally translates to consistency in promotions, content making, fan engagement, evolving your strategies, and continually integrating innovations. Lastly, there are a lot of benefits tied to it.

Firstly, you get to retain your old subscribers if you keep providing great content. And it gets better, an old subscriber could even refer you if you’re consistent and constantly produce great content. Secondly, consistent posts and quality engagement means more likes, tips, and earnings. That’s a win on your end, as potential subscribers see that you’re good at what you do and will love to subscribe to you, while existing subscribers keep subscribing and occasionally leave you tips. That’s more earnings on your end.

Hire an Agency

OnlyFans is a highly competitive platform with tons of creators offering the same content as you. Ultimately, it’s going to be difficult to gain more subscribers with the fierce competition, especially if you’re just starting out as a content model or creator on OnlyFans. However, you don’t have to go through such difficulties with less probability of actually succeeding when you can hire an OnlyFans agency.
